publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-610.2 Roseanna Cunningham: European Convention on Human Rights—As an amendment to motion (S1M-610) in the name of David McLetchie, delete from "consider" to end and insert: "establish a Human Rights Commission which would advise both the Parliament and the Executive, issue guidance and promote good practice in public authorities, promote greater access to justice and advise on wider international human rights obligations." Supported by: Michael Matheson*, Christine Grahame*, Michael Russell*
